title: Gather Requirements
description: Collect and document requirements for the CrossFunctionalAlignmentFacilitator system, including input from stakeholders across different functional areas.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the system, including components, data flow, integration points with existing systems, and a high-level deployment strategy. Consider scalability, maintainability, and modular design principles. Identify potential risks and mitigation strategies.

title: Develop Data Ingestion and Processing Pipeline
description: Build the data ingestion and processing pipeline to collect and analyze data from various functional areas.

title: Implement Alignment Identification Algorithm
description: Develop the core algorithm to identify opportunities for better alignment between functional areas based on the processed data.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the system, including visualization of alignment opportunities and collaboration suggestions.

title: Set up Deployment and Monitoring
description: Configure the deployment environment, including infrastructure, monitoring, and logging for the system.
dependencies: Develop Data Ingestion and Processing Pipeline

title: Conduct Security Audit
description: Perform a comprehensive security audit of the system to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities.
dependencies: Develop Data Ingestion and Processing Pipeline

title: Test and Validate System
description: Develop and execute test cases to validate the functionality and performance of the system, including integration and end-to-end testing.
dependencies: Develop Data Ingestion and Processing Pipeline

title: Document System and Processes
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the system, including user guides, technical documentation, and operational procedures.
dependencies: Develop Data Ingestion and Processing Pipeline

title: Deploy and Launch System
description: Deploy the system to the production environment and coordinate the launch, including communication and training for end-users.
